reporting-org.narrative: Natural Resources Institute, University of Greenwich

title.narrative: Information and Analysis to Support Business Case Development for Supporting Pastoralism and Agriculture in Recurrent and Protracted Crises (SPARC)

description.narrative: Provision of background reviews to develop DFID's business case for the proposed Support to Pastoralism and Agriculture in Recurrent and Protracted Crises (SPARC)- part of the Expert Advisory Call Down Services - Lot B: Strengthening Resilience and Response to Crises Programme.

recipient-country.narrative: Provision of background reviews to develop DFID's business case for the proposed Support to Pastoralism and Agriculture in Recurrent and Protracted Crises (SPARC)
